Main Navigation

Navigation Full Width

The full-width main navigation spans the entire width of the page, offering a streamlined and responsive menu that adapts to all screen sizes. It features clearly labeled links to key sections of the website, dropdown menus for organized content, and enhanced usability for both desktop and mobile users.

This description emphasizes the full-width layout, responsiveness, and ease of use.
